comment.author: 14481705@N04
comment._content: That's Lafayette Park seen from the Old Executive Office Building.  You can tell by the gates in the foreground.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Great catch, mosley.brian. We agree that this is Pennsylvania Avenue and Jackson Place, NW, looking at Lafayette Park. Thanks for your help!
